welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hefei, China! Get ready to be charmed by our city's beautiful landscapes, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hefei has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Shanghai Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Shanghai Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid phone number.
